review:
Visited her for both my pregnancies.
I have been to many gynaecs before but this doc is one of a kind... She is very patient, considerate and most importantly she listens to what you have to say.
She understands where our concerns are coming from and suggests accordingly.  Her ********* *** *** approach to towards patients , the way she treats them pre, during and post pregnancy are praise worthy.  She made my pregnancy very smooth and delivery much smoother.

I had a very good experience in my entire pregnancy.My pregnancy journey was very smooth due to her.She is very helpful and always ready to support me in my difficult situation.I m blessed with a baby girl in june 2022 and I am very thankful to her.She took very good care during and after delivery.Thank u so much dr.

Thank you doctor for making our difficult times easier with your great medical expertise and bringing our new born without complications with normal delivery.Your attention to details and straightforward way of communicating is just awesome. Rainbow hospital is lucky to have you aboard :)
